title: board 820-3437 no backlight
message:
I am very happy because LOUIS got the Forums working !!!
Had liquid damage , after cleaning the board there was no 
backlight , I did reflow the LP8550 then worked for 2 days 
then again no backlight , I replaced for new LP8550 but still no backlight , thought I might did  bad soldering joint !!! take it off cleaned bad very well , soldered another LP8550 but still nothing no backlight .

title: board 820-3437 no backlight
message:
Check traces between U7701 and L/D7701.
Pay atention to XW7720.
Post voltages on both pins od D7701.
